column6:
"MAGNETIC NORTH",2005,11
It's the shocking conclusion to the Ultimate X-Men's biggest adventure. In a story that pits brother against brother, friend against friend, it's Magneto versus the X-Men in final battle-inside the Ultimates headquarters, the Triskelion! Part 5 (of 5).
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.50
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | colorist:Justin Ponsor | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
